name: 8 minutes
description:
8 minutes is the time it takes for light to reach the Earth from the Sun.

In this game you are a ray of light trying to get to Earth.

Enjoy!

(I haven't been able to test the mac and linux versions, if you encounter any issues please tell me)

Controls:

WASD to move.

LSHIFT to speed up.

Q and E to rotate.

ESC to pause.
